message: As a {insert practice area} attorney, you have a unique opportunity to leverage PPC advertising for law firm growth. BUT keeping up with the ever-evolving PPC landscape can be challenging - especially for a busy attorney like you! Justia is here to help.

Join Justia Web Marketing Lead Samantha Larrus and Lead Marketing Analyst Jessica Risso on Thursday, August 24 at 3:00 p.m. ET /12:00 p.m. PT for our exclusive, members-only presentation: PPC Advertising in the Legal Industry: Challenges and Opportunities.
bottomline: Free Registration Now Open for All Members
